sub_industry.value: IT Solutions for Tech and Public Sector

short_description.value: Advantum Solutions Limited provides software solutions for innovative tech and public sector, focusing on agile project management and delivery of business value.

long_description.value: Advantum Solutions Limited is a company that provides software solutions for the tech and public sectors. They focus on agile project management and the delivery of business value. Their approach involves rapid, iterative prototyping of IT solutions with a focus on minimum viable product (MVP), staying within budget, and adapting swiftly to changing circumstances. They advise on modern agile software project management and help maintain and prioritize product backlogs to deliver features with the highest return on investment. The company is registered in England & Wales and is ISO 9001 / ISO 90003 compliant. They prioritize business value, predictable cost and schedule, elevated quality, mitigated risk, and timely available and highly relevant metrics. The company aims to deliver projects that meet the needs of their clients, focusing on customer satisfaction and progress visibility.

full_address.value: 71-75 Shelton Street, Covent Garden, London WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom
